objective: Migrate zjj-core beads module from rusqlite to sqlx with async/await patterns

context.codebase: Rust project zjj-core with existing beads.rs module (read-only query interface for .beads/beads.db SQLite database). Current implementation uses rusqlite (synchronous blocking). Already has db.rs using sqlx async for session management. Strict functional Rust enforced: zero unwraps, zero panics, forbid(unwrap_used, expect_used, panic). Moon build system required.
constraints: Must maintain exact same API surface for pure functions (filter_issues, sort_issues, etc)
Cannot break existing call sites in watcher.rs, dashboard.rs, commands
Zero unwraps/panics enforced by compiler lints
Read-only access to external .beads/beads.db (do not modify Beads system itself)
